payload.text: To make a contribution via cheque you will need to make the cheque out to ‘Panorama Super - *Your account number here* - *Your account name here*’.

You will need to then post the cheque along with a cover letter to;
BT Panorama
GPO Box 2861
Adelaide SA 5001
To make a contribution via cheque you will need to make the cheque out to ‘Panorama Super - *Your account number here* - *Your account name here*’.

You will need to then post the cheque along with a cover letter to;
BT Panorama
GPO Box 2861
Adelaide SA 5001
To make a contribution via cheque you will need to make the cheque out to ‘Panorama Super - *Your account number here* - *Your account name here*’.

You will need to then post the cheque along with a cover letter to;
BT Panorama
GPO Box 2861
Adelaide SA 5001
To make a deposit via cheque you will need to make the cheque out to ‘Panorama CMA - *Your account number here* - *Your account name here*’.

You will need to then post the cheque along with a cover letter to;
BT Panorama
GPO Box 2861
Adelaide SA 5001

Or alternatively, you can deposit your cheque at a Westpac Branch.
To make a deposit via cheque you will need to make the cheque out to ‘Panorama CMA - *Your account number here* - *Your account name here*’.

You will need to then post the cheque along with a cover letter to;
BT Panorama
GPO Box 2861
Adelaide SA 5001

Or alternatively, you can deposit your cheque at a Westpac Branch.
To make a deposit via cheque you will need to make the cheque out to ‘Panorama CMA - *Your account number here* - *Your account name here*’.

You will need to then post the cheque along with a cover letter to;
BT Panorama
GPO Box 2861
Adelaide SA 5001

Or alternatively, you can deposit your cheque at a Westpac Branch.
